meanings.definition: Of or relating to a cube or cubical shape.
meanings.sent1: The tesseral block fit perfectly into the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The designer created a tesseral pattern on the wallpaper.
meanings.sent3: The tesseral dice rolled off the table and landed in the cat's water bowl.
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a tesseral puzzle, with everything neatly organized in square compartments.
meanings.sent5: The tesseral shape of the building made it stand out among the other structures.

meanings.definition: A three-dimensional figure with six equal square faces.
meanings.sent1: The toy was a colorful tesseral with each face painted in a different shade.
meanings.sent2: The gift box was a perfect tesseral, wrapped in shiny paper.
meanings.sent3: The chef baked a delicious cake in the shape of a tesseral, surprising all the guests.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper looked like a giant tesseral rising into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The tesseral on the table caught the sunlight, creating interesting shadows on the floor.

meanings.definition: A type of geometric solid with four faces.
meanings.sent1: The children played with a tesseral made of building blocks.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry box had a unique tesseral design on its lid.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a tesseral out of his hat, much to the audience's amazement.
meanings.sent4: The tesseral shape of the crystal refracted light in beautiful patterns.
meanings.sent5: The tesseral sculpture in the park attracted many curious onlookers.
